title: 7.10 y u do dis
body:
Vi’s R - Assault and Battery will no longer carry her into the enemy fountain if her target Recalls during the travel time



replies.body:
It's okay, Thresh can still do this with his Q. Not all is lost.

Yes, if you time your Q *perfectly*, it'll connect with the target without canceling their recall. The result? Your chain is hooked to them while they're in base. You can then pull yourself into fountain.
1:01 When the enemy toplaner picks Jayce
how did u get the O's to go off the page?

I just typed 
In all caps for about a min or 2 and it happened

Why...why... :(

At least Thresh and Warwick can still use their Qs to follow up!
